description: This file defines a FastAPI route for searching travel destinations, including handling query parameters, database querying with SQLAlchemy, and constructing a paginated response.

classes.name: DestinationSearchResponse
classes.description: Response schema for paginated list of destinations matching search criteria.

classes.name: DestinationSearchResult
classes.description: Schema representing individual destination search result item.

methods.name: DestinationSearchResponse search_destinations( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, description="Search query text (partial match; case-insensitive)", ), db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of results to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip"), include_country: bool = Query(True, description="Include `country` field in search matching"), include_city: bool = Query(True, description="Include `city` field in search matching"), )
methods.description: API endpoint function to perform a partial, case-insensitive search over destinations with pagination.

ctags.name: search_destinations
ctags.signature: ( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, description="Search query text (partial match; case-insensitive)", ), db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of results to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip"), include_country: bool = Query(True, description="Include `country` field in search matching"), include_city: bool = Query(True, description="Include `city` field in search matching"), )
